name: Harmony (itch) (Captain Coder, Twitchywhalez, Aliax180)
description:
Harmony is a dungeon crawling puzzle adventure created in 7 days for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 . The theme is Duality. We hope you enjoy your journey in purgatory!

Survival Tips

You'll need your wits about you to make it through this adventure! 

  • Interact with everything in the dungeon to gain clues and learn the spells necessary to survive. 
  • If you find yourself falling out of balance, there is likely a spell to protect you.
  • When overwhelmed by darkness, cast light
  • When blinded by light, cast shade
  • If you get lost, there are two spells that allow you to see the dungeon from a birds eye view.
  • As you collect new runes, you unlock new spell combinations, do not hesitate to consult your spell book for clues.

Back Story:

A conflict has broken out amongst the Sol and Lun, deity's of the Sun and Moon. Your mentor, a Necromancer, in an attempt to resolve the conflict has been banished to purgatory. You awaken in purgatory with your mentor who requires your help to resolve the conflict between Sol and Lun. Can you find the Harmony within?

Controls:

WASD:  Move

QE: - Strafe

Spacebar/Mouse Click: - Interact

Click and Drag to use Runes
